name: SourceMovement
author: SketchFoxsky
description: Toggle the Source Engine movement system in ChilloutVR
changelog:
- Added world restriction via `[DisableStickers]` GameObject (thx Sketch).
- Added sticker placement preview.
- Fixed stickers being hit by VR switch shader replacement.
- Fixed Desktop Sticker placement bind firing when a text field was focused.
- **This version is not backwards compatible with previous versions over network.**
